price: ߒ߬ߓߵߊߟߊ߫ ߦߴߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߝߊߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐߞߣߍ߫ ߟߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߖߐ߲߬ߛߴߊߟߎ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ ߤߊߞߟߌߡߦߊ߫
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna
